prompt_base: hyperdetailed portrait of an imposing tall alien man, VIBRANT emerald green skin texture, stern expression, black cape and white turban, intense focused eyes, muscular physique, 8k cinematic photo
feature_prompt: detailed skin surface imperfections, subtle sheen on the skin, realistic fabric texture on turban and cape, sharp focus, menacing glare
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic, smooth green skin, human face, fleshy features, doll, flat lighting, low quality, (soft lighting:1.2), smiling
